name: Android Thumbnails Folder
summary: A folder with a .THUMBNAILS extension is a hidden folder stored in the sdcard/â€‹DCIM directory on select Android devices. It contains one or more .THUMBDATA files that store properties about thumbnail images indexed by the Gallery app to load images quicker. THUMBNAILS folders typically store .THUMBDATA3--1967290299 and .THUMBDATA3-1763508120 files.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
